entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
